name: Workbot - Sync NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New versapay update invoice command to Slack Workbot

input.name: update
input.parameters:
[
  {
    "control_type": "text",
    "label": "Invoice number",
    "name": "invoice_number",
    "type": "string",
    "optional": false,
    "hint": "NetSuite invoice number that you want to sync to VersaPay",
    "sample": "NX145851"
  }
]
input.description: This command sends the latest invoice information from NetSuite to VersaPay

properties.label: Invoice number
properties.name: invoice_number
properties.hint: NetSuite invoice number that you want to sync to VersaPay

extended_input_schema.name: postingPeriodRelative
extended_input_schema.label: Posting period relative
pick_list: First Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
First Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Fourth Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Fourth Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Last Fiscal Quarter One Fiscal Year Ago
Last Period One Fiscal Quarter Ago
Last Period One Fiscal Year Ago
Same Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Same Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy To Period
Same Period Of Last Fiscal Quarter
Second Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Second Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Third Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Third Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy

extended_input_schema.name: taxPeriodRelative
extended_input_schema.label: Tax period relative
pick_list: First Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
First Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Fourth Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Fourth Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Last Fiscal Quarter One Fiscal Year Ago
Last Period One Fiscal Quarter Ago
Last Period One Fiscal Year Ago
Same Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Same Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy To Period
Same Period Of Last Fiscal Quarter
Second Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Second Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy
Third Fiscal Quarter Of Last Fy
Third Fiscal Quarter Of This Fy

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2

input.text: Problem finding `#{_('data.workato_variable.73a662c6.value')}` in NetSuite.  NetSuite Error was: ```#{_('data.catch.ade97f21.message')}```

block.comment: Return the error back to the slack user.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2

input.text: Could not find an invoice with number `#{_('data.workato_variable.73a662c6.value')}` in NetSuite.

block.comment: Notify the slack user that the invoice could not be found.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

flow_id.name: Callable - Upsert NetSuite Invoice to VersaPay Invoice

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Payment Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_payment_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this payment if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a payment creating an invoice which recreates the payment...)

properties.label: Ignore NetSuite Credit Memo Internal ID
properties.name: ignore_ns_credit_memo_internal_id
properties.hint: Ignore this credit memo if creating payments for a new invoice (to prevent infinite loops of a credit memo creating an invoice which recreates the credit memo...)

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2
block.comment: Success notification back to Slack user.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.

block.name: post_bot_reply_v2

input.text: Problem updating `#{_('data.workato_variable.73a662c6.value')}` in VersaPay.  Error was: ```#{_('data.catch.fdb8dfbc.message')}```

block.comment: Return the error back to the slack user.

extended_input_schema.name: value
extended_input_schema.label: Value
extended_input_schema.hint:
Provide a value for the variable. When the value is not supplied, the variable is not updated.
To reset the value, set the value to nil in formula mode.
